00015 #ifndef __MLPACK_CORE_OPTIMIZER_SA_LAPLACE_DISTRIBUTION_HPP
00016 #define __MLPACK_CORE_OPTIMIZER_SA_LAPLACE_DISTRIBUTION_HPP
00017 
00018 namespace mlpack {
00019 namespace distribution {
00020 
00051 class LaplaceDistribution
00052 {
00053  public:
00058   LaplaceDistribution() : scale(0) { }
00059 
00067   LaplaceDistribution(const size_t dimensionality, const double scale) :
00068       mean(arma::zeros<arma::vec>(dimensionality)), scale(scale) { }
00069 
00076   LaplaceDistribution(const arma::vec& mean, const double scale) :
00077       mean(mean), scale(scale) { }
00078 
00080   size_t Dimensionality() const { return mean.n_elem; }
00081 
00085   double Probability(const arma::vec& observation) const;
00086 
00093   arma::vec Random() const
00094   {
00095     arma::vec result(mean.n_elem);
00096     result.randu();
00097 
00098     // Convert from uniform distribution to Laplace distribution.
00099     // arma::sign() does not exist in Armadillo < 3.920 so we have to do this
00100     // elementwise.
00101     for (size_t i = 0; i < result.n_elem; ++i)
00102     {
00103       if (result[i] < 0)
00104         result[i] = mean[i] + scale * result[i] * std::log(1 + 2.0 * (result[i]
00105             - 0.5));
00106       else
00107         result[i] = mean[i] - scale * result[i] * std::log(1 - 2.0 * (result[i]
00108             - 0.5));
00109     }
00110 
00111     return result;
00112   }
00113 
00119   void Estimate(const arma::mat& observations);
00120 
00126   void Estimate(const arma::mat& observations,
00127                 const arma::vec& probabilities);
00128 
00130   const arma::vec& Mean() const { return mean; }
00132   arma::vec& Mean() { return mean; }
00133 
00135   double Scale() const { return scale; }
00137   double& Scale() { return scale; }
00138 
00140   std::string ToString() const;
00141 
00142  private:
00144   arma::vec mean;
00146   double scale;
00147 
00148 };
00149 
00150 }; // namespace distribution
00151 }; // namespace mlpack
00152 
00153 #endif
